ISSUE.TITLE: Update template add button to account for workflow options
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Currently the template add button is hidden/shown based on the options response on `/api/v2/job_templates` _only_. The button should be shown when the user can create a job template _or_ a workflow job template. The options in the dropdown should also hidden/shown based on what the user has permission to do. See this block https://github.com/ansible/awx/blob/devel/awx/ui/client/features/templates/templatesList.controller.js#L54-L56 in the existing application for reference

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4924 from fosterseth/backport_awx_pr_9671_local_registry [3.8.3 backport] Fix api/v2/metrics data displaying incorrect value

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4942 from jbradberry/analytics-naive-datetimes-fix-3.8.3 Adjust datetimes to be aware when using awx-manage gather_analytics
